description: In a slim fit, the No Sweat Short is crafted in our bestselling stretch fabric that's designed to feel like your sweats with 5-pocket detailing for polished versatility. Plant-based fibres offer moisture wicking and antibacterial properties for complete comfort on hot weather days.
name: Duer No Sweat Slim Shorts, 10" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: the fabric stretches in all directions, for maximum comfort, flexibility and maneuverability
Coolmax® fibres wicks moisture from the body in heat and insulates for warmth in the cold weather
